ExternalProject_Add(cppdemo
	URL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cppdemo.tar.xz
	URL_HASH SHA1=1444dd812fdfc3fa9b48ba9607a4504fcf63bba5
	CMAKE_ARGS
        -DANDROID_ABI=${ANDROID_ABI}
        -DANDROID_PLATFORM=${ANDROID_PLATFORM}
		-DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=OFF
        -DBUILD_TESTS=OFF
        -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=<INSTALL_DIR>
    	-DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE}
	BUILD_BYPRODUCTS <INSTALL_DIR>/lib/libcppdemo.a)
